mapper.insert: INSERT INTO virtual_doctor_call_info (sin_token, virtual_drug_user_id, virtual_doctor_id, doctor_questionnaire_id, product_id, mobile, type, visit_result, attitude, next_visit_time,remark,create_time) VALUES (#{sinToken}, #{virtualDrugUserId}, #{virtualDoctorId}, #{doctorQuestionnaireId}, #{productId}, #{mobile}, #{type}, #{visitResult}, #{attitude}, #{nextVisitTime}, #{remark}, NOW())
